text: Allaha nabhomandala o bhumandalera jyoti, tamra jyotira udaharana yena ekati kulangi, yate ache ekati pradipa, pradipati ekati kamcapatre sthapita, kamcapatrati ujjbala naksatra sadrsya. Tate putahpabitra yayatuna brksera taila prajbalita haya, ya purbamukhi naya ebam pascimamukhi'o naya. Agni sparsa na karale'o tara taila yena alokita ha'oyara nikatabarti. Jyotira upara jyoti. Allaha yake iccha patha dekhana tamra jyotira dike. Allaha manusera jan'ye drstantasamuha barnana karena ebam allaha saba bisaye jnata.
